00001 // A set of classes deriving from TTask
00002 // see macro tasks.C to see an example of use
00003 // The Exec function of each class prints one line when it is called.
00004       
00005 #include "TTask.h"
00006    
00007 class MyRun : public TTask {
00008    
00009 public:
00010    MyRun() {;}
00011    MyRun(const char *name, const char *title);
00012    virtual ~MyRun() {;}
00013    void Exec(Option_t *option="");
00014    
00015    ClassDef(MyRun,1)   // Run Reconstruction task
00016 };
00017
